pages.title: Pyramid Core
pages.text: The heart of everything. The $(thing)Pyramid Core$() is a power generator that sits at the top of a sandstone and gold pyramid. Insert a $(item)Graviton$() as fuel and it starts producing FE.$(br2)Without the right structure underneath, it won't do anything.

pages.title: Pyramid Structure
pages.text: Build the structure layer by layer below the Core, all centered:$(br2)$(bold)Top: Pyramid Core$()$(br)Place the Core block here.$(br2)$(bold)Layer 1$() (1 below Core):$(br)3x3 $(item)Gold Blocks$()$(br2)$(bold)Layer 2$() (2 below Core):$(br)5x5 $(item)Sandstone$()$(br2)$(bold)Layer 3$() (3 below Core):$(br)7x7 $(item)Sandstone$()$(br2)$(bold)Layer 4$() (4 below Core):$(br)9x9 $(item)Sandstone$()

pages.title: Sandstone Types
pages.text: Any of these sandstone variants work for Layers 2-4:$(br2)$(li)Sandstone$(li)Chiseled Sandstone$(li)Cut Sandstone$(li)Smooth Sandstone$(br2)You can mix and match them freely within the same layer.

pages.title: Activation & Fuel
pages.text: Once the structure is built, right-click the Core to open its GUI. Place a $(item)Graviton$() in the fuel slot and use an $(item)Ancient Ankh$() on the structure to activate it.$(br2)The Core generates FE continuously while active. Each Graviton is slowly consumed as energy is produced. Place an $(l:alientech:machines/ancient_charger)Ancient Charger$() next to the Core to buffer and distribute the energy.$(br2)$(italic)Tip: The Core outputs energy from all 6 sides.$()
